resources.string:
It is very simple to play this game.

After you press "New Game", the game will immediately start.

On the top right of the screen, you will see that there is a stopwatch.
The objective of this game is to finish naming these notes as fast as possible.
The faster the better!!

To name the notes on the page, you simply have to click on thebutton that has the corresponding note name.
If you miss a note, the game will give you an another note. The one you missed will come back later.

Once you have finished the set of note, the game will record your fastest time.

Make sure to keep practicing!

Soon you will be a master at naming notes!

Good luck!

Hello and thank you for using my app!
I am a computer science student at the University of Washington and have been a clarinet teacher for the last few years.

One of the main reason I built this app is that learning to read notes is actually not that fun. This is a simple app that gamifies the note learning process. I really hope you enjoy using it!
